DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare endoscopic radiofrequency ablation with photodynamic therapy for inoperable cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Endoscopic Radiofrequency Ablation Versus Photodynamic Therapy for Inoperable Cholangiocarcinoma
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 years old Pathologically or radiologically confirmed biliary malignant Inoperability by staging Cholangiocarcinoma with widespread metastasis Coagulopathy (INR > 2.0 or prothrombin time > 100 sec or platelet count < 50,000) Prior SEMS placement Pregnancy Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status ≥ 3 ) Life expectancy < 3months
